TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Toolset extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represent an aggregation of a tools version (eg. "2.0"), tools path, and optional set of associated properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UNDONE: (danmose) Review immutability. If this is not immutable, add a mechanism to notify the project collection/s owning it to increment their toolsetVersion.

MemberSignature.Value: public Toolset (string toolsVersion, string toolsPath, Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection projectCollection, string msbuildOverrideTasksPath);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string toolsVersion, string toolsPath, class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection projectCollection, string msbuildOverrideTasksPath) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.param: Path to this toolset's tasks and targets
The project collection from which to obtain the properties.
The path to search for msbuild overridetasks files.
Docs.summary: Creates a toolset with the given tools version and tools path. Global, reserved, and environment properties are taken from the given project collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public Toolset (string toolsVersion, string toolsPath, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,string> buildProperties, Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection projectCollection, string msbuildOverrideTasksPath);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string toolsVersion, string toolsPath, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, string> buildProperties, class Microsoft.Build.Evaluation.ProjectCollection projectCollection, string msbuildOverrideTasksPath) cil managed

Docs.param: Path to this toolset's tasks and targets

Properties that should be associated with the Toolset.
May be null, in which case an empty property group will be used.
The project collection from which to obtain the properties.
The path to search for msbuild overridetasks files.
Docs.summary: Creates a toolset with the given tools version, tools path, and build properties. Global, reserved, and environment properties are taken from the given project collection.
Gets the optional properties associated with the toolset.
Docs.value: Returns the optional properties associated with the toolset.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets a path to the tasks and targets of this toolset.
Docs.value: Returns a path to the tasks and targets of this toolset.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Corresponds to $(MSBuildToolsPath) in a project or targets file.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets the name of this toolset.
Docs.value: Returns the name of this toolset.
